name: Raime
description: '''Raime''' are an English [[experimental music]] band from London. Formed by childhood friends Joe Andrews and Tom Halstead circa 2008, the duo released their first [[Extended play|EP]], ''Raime EP'', in 2010. Their debut studio album, 2012's ''[[Quarter Turns over a Living Line]]'', was met with widespread critical acclaim and landed on multiple lists of best albums of the year. Since then Raime released multiple EPs and singles. In 2021 they were joined by their long-time collaborator, drummer [[Valentina Magaletti]] to form the group '''Moin'''. As a trio, they released three studio albums: ''Moot!'' in 2021, ''Paste'' in 2022 and ''You Never End'' in 2024.
